title: Cinematic Music of The Universe
description: A great quality melodic ambient space music from experienced composer
longDescription:
A great quality melodic cinematic space music from Marcin Klosowski.

Listen Demo here: Click here!Â 

Package includes 6 great quality mastered tracks, 2 of them are completely looped for battle and menu/gameplay. 4 of them are full cinematic tracks with melody and atmosphere, perfect for menus or gameplay, no simple instruments, no simple 1 layered pads, just pure music from skilled composer promoted on huge youtube channels like "Epic Music World" and "Premium Music HQ" All songs are available in WAV format.


Don't miss my other package with Cinematic Music and Battle Loops:

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/cinematic-music-and-battle-loops


Feel free to contact me for help/edits or custom music or sounds via email: quosik@gmail.com
